email_subject: Seeking Internship Opportunity – Ready to Add Value!
email_body:
Hi {{FIRST_NAME}}, 👋🏻

I hope you’re doing well. My name is Toshak Bhatnagar, and I’m reaching out to express my interest in an internship opportunity at {{COMPANY_NAME}}.

With a strong focus on business, finance, and strategic operations, I aim to contribute by bringing:
• Research-driven insights and analytical thinking.
• Structured support and process improvement for ongoing tasks.
• A fresh, adaptable mindset to fast-paced teams like yours.

I’ve attached my CV for your reference and would genuinely appreciate the opportunity to connect and contribute.

Best regards,
Toshak Bhatnagar
+91-8854051928
